page.title: 08BAR HILL QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: BAR HILL QUESTIONNAIRE SURVEY Initially our survey was part of a class topic and nothing to do with the Domesday Project.We first sent our questionnaires to parents of children in our class only.Forty-seven of these were returned and we found the results very interesting.When we started the Domesday Project we decided to send the questionnaires out to the parents of children in the whole school,senior citizens,married couples with no children and single people.We had 579 returned.There is a population of around 4,000 in Bar Hill at the moment so we thought our sample was quite good as it was well spread and covered roughly 12.5% of total population.
